name: Original
detailed_description: “Original” is the first casual role-playing game developed by AK who is an independent game developer. This game also means the first step of AK from Dream Pavilion(DP). This is a competitive, funny, lucky game for players. AK hope “Original” can get the recognition of players, and at the same time he prefers to get more suggestion and feedbacks about “Original”.
about_the_game: “Original” is the first casual role-playing game developed by AK who is an independent game developer. This game also means the first step of AK from Dream Pavilion(DP). This is a competitive, funny, lucky game for players. AK hope “Original” can get the recognition of players, and at the same time he prefers to get more suggestion and feedbacks about “Original”.
short_description: This is a casual, role-playing game (RPG). The gameplay is simple and easy to understand. In some levels，you just need to control your role to get scores by eating the game elements and avoid the game elements which will make you lose your points. In some levels you need to jump to pass the level.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows7
  • Processor: i3 8100
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: digital
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows10
  • Processor: i7 8700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 GAMER
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Blaster X-Fi Surround 5.1 Pro
